_header: O Immensa Trinitas Father and Son maker of all
_description: A macaronic prayer to the Trinity — twelve 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc); first two stanzas, ababbaba ababbaba; including refrain, ‘O lux beata trinitas’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
O Immensa trinitasffather and sone makar of
                    all…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…pray thow þi sone þat it so beO lux beata
                        trinitas
CamMagPep2553.Editions:
Craigie,  William Alexander. 
             The Maitland Folio Manuscript, Containing Poems by Sir Richard
                Maitland, Dunbar, Douglas, Henryson, and others.
             2 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         n.s. 7 (1919), 20 (1927); Edinburgh and London: Blackwood, 1919,
            1927: 1.197-9.
